TopicTitle: Problem- crew swap during orbital EVA?

Articles.Content:
I have successfully completed my first orbital rendezvous! I have three crewmembers in one ship (w/satellite to deploy) and Jeb just joined them with his own ship to help with the deployment.

I thought I would go ahead and perform my first orbital crew swap while I was at it. So, I EVA\'d Jeb to 'Existing Ship' and he grabbed a ladder. I tried pressing ESCAPE to go to the Space Center and select the other 'Rendezvous Ship,' but Space Center was not a clickable option. I tried clicking the hatch on the other ship and couldn\'t get the crew out.

I\'ve been able to swap crews on the Mun using the same process, but couldn\'t during this instance. Any insight?

Cool, thanks!

ETA: Thanks again, Endeavour. Crews successfully swapped! So many neat little things like that that I was not aware of. Just found out a week or so ago that the < and > keys control warp speed. I wonder what else is out there?

So many neat little things like that that I was not aware of. Just found out a week or so ago that the < and > keys control warp speed. I wonder what else is out there?

Hope to not ruin your sense of wonder

Key Bindings

You guys are awesome. I did a search for the key functions a while back, but I think my wife must have called me away or something as I forgot and never followed through.

I realize I could\'ve gone through the Settings menu in the game, but never took the time. I\'m gonna write this stuff down.

Excellent!!! /Mr. Burns

You can also personalize your controls quite easily.

For instance, my f1-f10 buttons wouldn't do anything in the game.

I simply swapped them for other keys(eg. P for photo).

Hope this helps:)
